custom_queries.name: Total COST_AMOUNT by REGION
custom_queries.sql_query:
SELECT
    d.REGION,
    SUM(f.COST_AMOUNT) as total_cost_amount,
    COUNT(*) as record_count
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d
    ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d.CUSTOMER_KEY
GROUP BY d.REGION
ORDER BY total_cost_amount DESC

custom_queries.snow_query:
SELECT
    d.CITY,
    SUM(f.COST_AMOUNT) as TOTAL_COST_AMOUNT,
    COUNT(*) as RECORD_COUNT
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_STORE d
    ON f.DIM_STORE_KEY = d.STORE_KEY
GROUP BY d.CITY
ORDER BY TOTAL_COST_AMOUNT DESC

custom_queries.name: Total COST_AMOUNT by DIM_CUSTOMER and DIM_DATE
custom_queries.sql_query:
SELECT
    d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME,
    SUM(f.COST_AMOUNT) as total_cost_amount,
    COUNT(*) as record_count
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d1 ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d1.CUSTOMER_KEY
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_DATE d2 ON f.DIM_DATE_KEY = d2.DATE_KEY
GROUP BY d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME
ORDER BY total_cost_amount DESC
custom_queries.snow_query:
SELECT
    d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME,
    SUM(f.COST_AMOUNT) as TOTAL_COST_AMOUNT,
    COUNT(*) as RECORD_COUNT
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d1 ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d1.CUSTOMER_KEY
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_DATE d2 ON f.DIM_DATE_KEY = d2.DATE_KEY
GROUP BY d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME
ORDER BY TOTAL_COST_AMOUNT DESC

    d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME,

INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_DATE d2 ON f.DIM_DATE_KEY = d2.DATE_KEY

ORDER BY total_discount_amount DESC

INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d1 ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d1.CUSTOMER_KEY
INNER JOIN DIM.DIM_DATE d2 ON f.DIM_DATE_KEY = d2.DATE_KEY
GROUP BY d1.REGION, d2.DAY_NAME
ORDER BY TOTAL_DISCOUNT_AMOUNT DESC

custom_queries.name: Conformance: FACT_SALES → DIM_CUSTOMER
custom_queries.sql_query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as orphaned_count
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
LEFT JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d
    ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d.CUSTOMER_KEY
WHERE d.CUSTOMER_KEY IS NULL
custom_queries.snow_query:
SELECT COUNT(*) as ORPHANED_COUNT
FROM FACT.FACT_SALES f
LEFT JOIN DIM.DIM_CUSTOMER d
    ON f.DIM_CUSTOMER_KEY = d.CUSTOMER_KEY
WHERE d.CUSTOMER_KEY IS NULL

WHERE d.DATE_KEY IS NULL
